This house believes that it is in the long-term interest of the Republican Party to protect the H-1B visa
Infoslide: The H-1B is a visa in the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act section 101 that allows United States employers to employ foreign workers in specialty occupations. It is the largest visa category in the United States in terms of guest worker numbers.
